subject: Football
lead_paragraph: As Mike Nugent, the Jets’ place-kicker, prepares to return to his home state this week in the middle of a turbulent season, lessons from his hometown are sprinkled in his answers.
snippet: As Mike Nugent, the Jets’ place-kicker, prepares to return to his home state this week in the middle of a turbulent season, lessons from his hometown are sprinkled in his answers.
